original_text: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed, he called two of his household servants, and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually;
korean_text: 마침 말하던 천사가 떠나매 고넬료가 집안 하인 둘과 부하 가운데 경건한 사람 하나를 불러

sentences.original_text: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 고넬료에게 말했던 천사가 떠났을 때

sentences.original_text: he called two of his household servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 집종 중 두 사람을 불렀으며

sentences.original_text: and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 항상 시종하던 경건한 군인 한 명도 불렀다
